net.sf.freecol.common.io

Class FreeColFileFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
      • net.sf.freecol.common.io.FreeColFileFilter

  • public class FreeColFileFilter
extends javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
    A simple file filter with a description.
